00048 URef< GrMeshVB >
00049 GrMeshBufferMgr::CreateMeshVB( unsigned int vertexCount, unsigned int usedComponents, unsigned int flags )
00050 {
00051         URef< GrMeshVB > meshVB = new GrMeshVB( vertexCount, usedComponents, flags );
00052         _meshVBs.Push( meshVB );
00053         return meshVB;
00054 }
00055 
00056 //----------------------------------------------------------
00057 URef< GrMeshVB >
00058 GrMeshBufferMgr::CreateMeshVB( unsigned int vertexCount, const SVec3* verts, const SVec3* normals, const SVec3* binormals,
00059                                                            const SVec3* tangents, const unsigned long* colors, const SVec2* uvs, unsigned int flags,
00060                                                            unsigned int maxVertexCount )
00061 {
00063         unsigned int usedComponents = CalcComponents( verts, normals, tangents, binormals, colors, uvs );
00064         URef< GrMeshVB > meshVB = new GrMeshVB( vertexCount, verts, normals, binormals, tangents, colors, uvs,
00065                 flags, maxVertexCount );
00066         _meshVBs.Push( meshVB );
00067 
00069         return meshVB;
00070 }

00093 //----------------------------------------------------------
00094 void
00095 GrMeshBufferMgr::PreContextReset()
00096 {
00098         unsigned int meshVBCount = _meshVBs.GetElemCount();
00099         unsigned int i = 0;
00100         while ( i < meshVBCount )
00101         {
00103                 if ( _meshVBs[ i ]->GetRef() == 1 )
00104                 {
00105                         _meshVBs.Erase( i );
00106                         --meshVBCount;
00107                         continue;
00108                 }
00109 
00111                 _meshVBs[ i ]->PreContextReset();
00112                 ++i;
00113         }
00114 
00116         unsigned int meshIBCount = _meshIBs.GetElemCount();
00117         i = 0;
00118         while ( i < meshIBCount )
00119         {
00121                 if ( _meshIBs[ i ]->GetRef() == 1 )
00122                 {
00123                         _meshIBs.Erase( i );
00124                         --meshIBCount;
00125                         continue;
00126                 }
00127 
00129                 _meshIBs[ i ]->PreContextReset();
00130                 ++i;
00131         }
00132 }
00133 
00134 //----------------------------------------------------------
00135 void
00136 GrMeshBufferMgr::PostContextReset()
00137 {
00139         unsigned int meshVBCount = _meshVBs.GetElemCount();
00140         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshVBCount; ++i )
00141                 _meshVBs[ i ]->PostContextReset();
00142 
00144         unsigned int meshIBCount = _meshIBs.GetElemCount();
00145         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshIBCount; ++i )
00146                 _meshIBs[ i ]->PostContextReset();
00147 }

00154 //----------------------------------------------------------
00155 unsigned int
00156 GrMeshBufferMgr::CalcComponents( const SVec3* verts, const SVec3* normals, const SVec3* tangents, const SVec3* binormals,
00157                                                                  const unsigned long* colors, const SVec2* uvs )
00158 {
00160         unsigned int components = 0;
00161         if ( verts )
00162                 components |= GR_ATTRIB_POSITION_MASK;
00163         if ( normals )
00164                 components |= GR_ATTRIB_NORMAL_MASK;
00165         if ( tangents )
00166                 components |= GR_ATTRIB_TANGENT_MASK;
00167         if ( binormals )
00168                 components |= GR_ATTRIB_BINORMAL_MASK;
00169         if ( colors )
00170                 components |= GR_ATTRIB_COLOR_MASK;
00171         if ( uvs )
00172                 components |= GR_ATTRIB_TEXCOORD_MASK;
00173 
00175         return components;
00176 }
